briefTitle: Evaluation of Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of Targretin Capsules in Patients With Advanced or Metastatic Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
officialTitle: Randomized Phase III Trial Comparing Targretin Capsules/Carboplatin/Paclitaxel Versus Carboplatin/Paclitaxel in Chemotherapy-Na√Øve Patients With Advanced or Metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
summary: This study evaluates the use of Targretin capsules (bexarotene) in combination with standard chemotherapy for the treatment of metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) in patients who have not yet received chemotherapy for their lung cancer.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From date of randomization to date of death
